text: Maruyamu no ko īsā ga, kō itta toki o omoiokose. `Isuraeru no shison-tachi yo, hontōni watashi wa, anata gata ni (tsukawasa reta) arrā no shito de, watashi yori izen ni,(kudasarete iru) rippō o kakushō shi, mata watashi no nochi ni kuru shito no kippō o ataeru. Sono namae wa, ahamadodearu.'Daga kare ga meishō o motte arawareta toki, kare-ra wa,`kore wa akiraka ni majutsudearu.' To itta
